name: ORS Staff Member Activity at Agency Locations
description:
This report is aimed at Local System Administrators in prisons who need to maintain the positions held by staff at establishments in the 'Maintain Staff Member Activity'(OUMSMALA) screen in Prison-NOMIS. The report returns a list of staff, with local admin authority,who do not have any positions entered against an establishment (aka 'agency location') along with a list of staff who have active positions recorded.
UAR0007 - v00.00.01 Last Modified: 21/03/13

dataset.name: Positions and Agency Locations
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_STAFF_MEMBERS.FIRST_NAME, AT_STAFF_MEMBERS.LAST_NAME, AT_STAFF_MEMBERS.STAFF_ID, AT_STATUS_REF.DESCRIPTION, AT_STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.USERNAME, AT_VIEW_DBA_USERS.ACCOUNT_STATUS, OMS_OWNER.LAA_GENERAL_USERS.USERNAME AS LAA_GENERAL_USER_NAME, OMS_OWNER.LAA_GENERAL_USERS.LOCAL_AUTHORITY_CODE, AT_POS_REF.DESCRIPTION AS POSITION_DESCRIPTION, AT_STAFF_LOCATION_ROLES.FROM_DATE, AT_STAFF_LOCATION_ROLES.TO_DATE, TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AS TODAY FROM OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_ACCOUNT_AGENCY_LOCS, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_POSITION_AGENCIES, OMS_OWNER.USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS AT_USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS, OMS_OWNER.STAFF_MEMBERS AT_STAFF_MEMBERS, OMS_OWNER.STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS AT_STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_STATUS_REF, OMS_OWNER.V_TAG_DBA_USERS AT_VIEW_DBA_USERS, OMS_OWNER.LAA_GENERAL_USERS, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_POS_REF, OMS_OWNER.STAFF_LOCATION_ROLES AT_STAFF_LOCATION_ROLES WHERE (AT_STAFF_MEMBERS.STAFF_ID = AT_STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.STAFF_ID) AND (AT_STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.USERNAME = AT_USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME) AND (AT_STATUS_REF.DOMAIN = 'STAFF_STATUS') AND (AT_STATUS_REF.CODE = AT_STAFF_MEMBERS.STATUS) AND (AT_STATUS_REF.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID = AT_ACCOUNT_AGENCY_LOCS.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_ACCOUNT_AGENCY_LOCS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_ACCOUNT_AGENCY_LOCS.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_VIEW_DBA_USERS.USERNAME = AT_STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.USERNAME) AND (AT_POS_REF.DOMAIN (+) = 'STAFF_POS') AND (AT_POS_REF.CODE (+) = AT_STAFF_LOCATION_ROLES.POSITION) AND (AT_POSITION_AGENCIES.AGY_LOC_ID (+) = AT_STAFF_LOCATION_ROLES.CAL_AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_POSITION_AGENCIES.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE (+) = 'INST') AND (AT_POSITION_AGENCIES.ACTIVE_FLAG (+) = 'Y') AND (AT_STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.STAFF_ID = AT_STAFF_LOCATION_ROLES.SAC_STAFF_ID (+)) AND (AT_STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.USERNAME = OMS_OWNER.LAA_GENERAL_USERS.USERNAME (+)) AND ((AT_STATUS_REF.CODE IN ('All') OR 'All' IN ('All')) AND (AT_STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.STAFF_USER_TYPE = 'GENERAL') AND (NOT AT_STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.USERNAME LIKE '%_CR') AND AT_ACCOUNT_AGENCY_LOCS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_) AND NOT OMS_OWNER.LAA_GENERAL_USERS.USERNAME IS NULL AND OMS_OWNER.LAA_GENERAL_USERS.LOCAL_AUTHORITY_CODE = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_) AND (AT_POSITION_AGENCIES.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_) OR AT_POSITION_AGENCIES.AGY_LOC_ID IS NULL) AND (AT_STAFF_LOCATION_ROLES.TO_DATE IS NULL OR AT_STAFF_LOCATION_ROLES.TO_DATE > TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) AND (AT_POS_REF.CODE IN ('All') OR 'All' IN ('All') OR AT_POS_REF.code IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, STAFF_ID, DESCRIPTION, USERNAME, ACCOUNT_STATUS, LAA_GENERAL_USER_NAME, LOCAL_AUTHORITY_CODE, POSITION_DESCRIPTION, FROM_DATE, TO_DATE, TODAY FROM dataset_base_)

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE POSITION_DESCRIPTION IS NOT NULL)

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE POSITION_DESCRIPTION IS NULL)

errors.error:
Error: ORA-00942: table or view does not exist
Help: https://docs.oracle.com/error-help/db/ora-00942/
